text: You know, we youtubers give Youtube a lot of shit all the time
because their copyright system is broken,
their community guidelines is inconsistent...
It seems like all the time we're just giving youtube so much shit
but sometimes Youtube does something that is so cool,
so unexpected, I just... I'm just blown away.
and that happened to me this week
I thought it was so cool, I just really wanted to make a video to talk about it
So for a change I can actually say, "Hey, you know what, Youtube? You did something really dope!"
They didn't even advertise it. They didn't... It was very subtle. It was just between me and them
And I feel like I have an obligation to give them the credit they deserve for doing something so great.
Now, what happened this week, is that somebody filed a copyright takedown
On one of our videos
And I don't want to say who it was because I don't want to start a witch hunt
Or start hate on this person
I will say it wasn't one of the usual suspects
It wasn't SOFLO or anyone like that
Soflo was actually a sweetheart about our newest video we posted yesterday
He sent me a nice tweet and I thought it was pretty dope
It was a classic reaction video that was requested to be removed
..about the person we made it about
And YouTube sent me this email that blew me away
Copyright@YouTube.com
I saw this in my email, I'm like, "Ohh fuck here we go. Here we go again, right?"
So here I'm gonna read it to you
We received the copyright infringement notification below regarding your video.
We believe your content is protected by fair use, fair dealing, or a similar exceptions to copyright protection
We are writing to let you know we did not plan to remove your videos at this time!
You have control over the availability of your videos on your channel, including the ability to delete them if you choose.
Crazy! This was sent from Copyright@YouTube.com
From their legal team
Which means that they received a takedown...
on our reaction video we made
and made the decision to keep it up because they thought it was Fair Use
I have never seen that before. I was moved!
I was moved. And you know, it's a- it's a
... simple little play but it meant a lot to me and it was like a really beautiful thing for me
to see YouTube actually coming out and protecting its users
So it might be- seem like a small thing but to me it seems really cool
And I just felt like, obliged to actually.. tell you guys
about this really cool thing YouTube did
So, Thank you YouTube! Thank you for doing this awesome thing.
and I hope you keep it up and let me be the first one to say here on YouTube
maybe the first person who has ever said this-
I'm proud of you
Keep it up, thank you YouTube. We Appreciate Ya!
Guys thanks for watching and let's give thanks to this
wonderful platform that we all love to shit on but is actually pretty dope.
Thank you YouTube
